name: Hero Control Deck
author: That1GuyLouis213
notes: KOG with e-hero's. Shout out to Miguel Joker AKA the original creator of this deck, I used this from legend 2 to KOG with 10 straight wins, most of you have already seen the deck list when I faced Dkayed on stream yesterday and prevented his KOG rank up (was not intentional just wanted to climb back up to legend 3 and got paired against him as a result )   LAMAYO ( pls don't ban me from discord Senpai )
